Verses: 1 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoyaakkeem Arasaanda Moondraam Varushaththile Baabilonin Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Erusalemukku Vandhu, Adhai Mutrikkai Pottaan.

2 appozhudhu Aandavar Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoyaakkeemaiyum Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Paaththirangalil Silavatraiyum Avan Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Avan Andhap Paaththirangalai Sineyaar Dhesaththilulla Than Dhevanudaiya Kovilukkuk Kondupoi, Avaigalaith Than Dhevanudaiya Pandasaalaikkul Vaiththaan.

3 appozhudhu Isravel Puththirarukkulle Raajakulaththaargalilum Dhuraimakkalilum Yaadhoru Maasum Illaadhavargalum, Azhagaanavargalum, Sagala Gnaanaththilum Therinavargalum, Arivil Sirandhavargalum, Kalviyil Nibunarum, Raajaavin Aramanaiyile Sevikkath Thiramaiyullavargalumaagiya Sila Vaalibarai Konduvaravum,
4 avargalukkuk Kaldheyarin Ezhuththaiyum Baashaiyaiyum Katrukkodukkavum Raajaa Than Pradhaanigalin Thalaivanaagiya Aspenaasukkuk Karpiththaan.

5 raajaa, Thaan Unnum Pojanaththileyum Thaan Kudikkum Dhraatcharasaththileyum Dhinam Oru Pangai Avargalukku Niyamiththu, Avargalai Moondruvarusham Valarkkavum, Adhin Mudivile Avargal Raajaavukku Munbaaga Nirkumpadi Seyyavum Kattalaiyittaan.
6 avargalukkul Yoodhaa Puththiraraagiya Dhaaniyel, Ananiyaa, Meeshaavel, Asariyaa Enbavargal Irundhaargal.
7 pradhaanigalin Thalaivan, Dhaaniyelukku Peldheshaadhsaar Endrum, Ananiyaavukku Saadhraak Endrum, Meeshaavelukku Meshaak Endrum, Asariyaavukku Aabedhnego Endrum Marupeyarittaan.

8 dhaaniyel Raajaavin Pojanaththinaalum Avar Paanampannum Dhraatcharasaththinaalum Thannaith Theettuppaduththalaagaadhendru, Than Irudhayaththil Theermaanampannikkondu, Thannaith Theettuppaduththaadhapadi Pradhaanigalin Thalaivanidaththil Vendikkondaan.
9 dhevan Dhaaniyelukkup Pradhaanigalin Thalaivanidaththil Dhayavum Irakkamum Kidaikkumpadi Seydhaar.

10 pradhaanigalin Thalaivan Dhaaniyelai Nokki Ungalukkup Pojanaththaiyum Paanaththaiyum Kuriththirukkira Raajaavaagiya En Aandavanukku Naan Bayappadugiren; Avar Ungalodoththa Vaalibarin Mugangalaippaarkkilum Ungal Mugangal Vaadipponavaigalaagak Kaanavendiyadhenna? Adhinaal Raajaa Ennai Sirachchedhampannuvaare Endraan.
11 appozhudhu Pradhaanigalin Thalaivanaale, Dhaaniyel, Ananiyaa, Mishaavel, Asariyaa Enbavargalmel Visaarippukkaaranaaga Vaikkappatta Melshaar Enbavanai Dhaaniyel Nokki:
12 paththunaalvaraikkum Umadhu Adiyaarai Sodhiththuppaarum; Engalukkup Pusikka Paruppu Mudhalaana Marakkarigalaiyum, Kudikkath Thanneeraiyum Koduththu,
13 engal Mugangalaiyum Raajapojanaththil Pusikkira Vaalibarudaiya Mugangalaiyum Oththuppaarum; Pinbu Neer Kaangirapadi Umadhu Adiyaarukku Seyyum Endraan.
14 avan Indhak Kaariyaththile Avargalukku Sevikoduththu, Paththunaalalavum Avargalai Sodhiththuppaarththaan.
15 paththunaal Sendrapinbu, Raajapojanaththaip Pusiththa Ellaa Vaalibaraippaarkkilum Avargal Mugam Kalaiyulladhaayum, Sareeram Pushtiyulladhaayum Kaanappattadhu.
16 aagaiyaal Melshaar Avargal Pusikkak Kattalaiyaana Pojanaththaiyum, Avargal Kudikkak Kattalaiyaana Dhraatcharasaththaiyum Neekkivaiththu, Avargalukkup Paruppu Mudhalaanavaigalaik Koduththaan.

17 indha Naalu Vaalibarukkum Dhevan Sagala Ezhuththilum Gnaanaththilum Arivaiyum Saamarththiyaththaiyum Koduththaar; Dhaaniyelai Sagala Dharisanangalaiyum Soppanangalaiyum Ariyaththakka Arivullavanaakkinaar.
18 avargalai Raajaavinidaththil Konduvarugiradharkuk Kuriththa Naatkal Niraiverinapodhu, Pradhaanigalin Thalaivan Avargalai Nebugaadhnechchaarukku Munbaagak Konduvandhu Vittaan.
19 raajaa Avargalode Pesinaan; Avargal Ellaarukkullum Dhaaniyel, Ananiyaa, Meeshaavel, Asariyaa Enbavargalaippola Veroruvarum Kaanappadavillai; Aagaiyaal Ivargal Raajasamugaththil Nindraargal.

20 gnaanaththukkum Buththikkum Aduththa Endha Vishayaththil Raajaa Avargalaik Kettu Visaariththaano, Adhile Than Raajyam Engumulla Sagala Saasthirigalilum Josiyarilum Avargalaip Paththumadangu Samarththaraagak Kandaan.
21 kores Raajyabaarampannum Mudhalaam Varushamattum Dhaaniyel Ange Irundhaan.
